dmca.title: Adserver Software Provider Alleges Infringement
dmca.body:
FAX
To:

Google Inc,
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

From:

W3matter LLC
[Private]
[Private]
Forest Hills NY, 11375
USA
DCMA Infringement Complaint
Urgent attention requested.
W3matter LLC
[Private]
[Private]
Forest Hills, NY 11375
Email: [Private]
March 18, 2005

Google Inc,
Attn: User Support, DCMA Complaints 
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google,

There is a clear violation of a copyright that is being listed in your search results.

The copyrighted work at issue is a program that our company developed and commercially sells at:
http://w3matter.com/products/adrevenue

The following search query will take you to the infringing content, where the owner of the site is freely distributing our commercial program, and where the site prominently appears in your search engine (result # 3). Because of this infringement, our sales are down and the webmaster is unresponsive, so your urgent response is appreciated to remove this site from your search result.

Search Query: revsense
Infringing Web Page: http://www.lugarus.com/modules.php?name=xNews&file=article&sid=4651

Based on Whois Information, you can contact the owner of the website at:

owner:	[Private]
email:	[Private]
address: [Private]
city:	Lugansk
postal-code: 91016
country:	UA

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
[Private]
President
[Private]
[Private]
